author: oheger
msg: CopyObjectDefaultHandler now uses BeanHelper for copying properties.
This method handles parameters object with a fluent API correctly.

author: oheger
msg: BeanHelper now provides a method for copying properties.
This method uses the internal PropertiesUtilsBean instance, so that enhanced
introspection is enabled. This is needed to deal with parameters objects

author: oheger
msg: MultiWrapDynaBean now uses BeanHelper for creating WrapDynaBeans.
This ensures that the enhanced introspection is used on the wrapped beans. So
parameters objects with a fluent API can be processed correctly.

author: oheger
msg: BeanHelper now provides a method for creating a WrapDynaBean.
For this purpose the managed BeanUtilsBean instance is needed.

author: oheger
msg: The tests for property access on builder parameters now use BeanHelper.
Due to the specially configured BeanUtilsBean instance managed by BeanHelper,
it is able to set properties on objects which do not fully comply to the Java
